name: Acindynus, Pegasius, Aphtonius, Elpidephorus, and Anempodistus
troparia: (Tone 2) O victorious witnesses of the Lord,* blessed is the earth which has drunk your blood.* Holy are the tombs which have received your bodies.* In the furnace you conquered the foe and preached Christ.* Intercede with the gracious Lord to save our souls.
